title: Deploy New Ubuntu Server VM from ISO
description: Create a new Ubuntu Server VM, configure storage and network, install from ISO

steps.instruction: List existing VMs to check names and avoid conflicts
steps.expected_outcome: Found 3 existing VMs: Windows-10, Kali-Linux, Dev-Environment

steps.instruction: Create new Ubuntu-Server VM with 4GB RAM and 50GB disk
steps.expected_outcome: VM created, SATA controller configured, 50GB VDI disk attached, ISO mounted

steps.instruction: Modify VM to use bridged networking for LAN access
steps.expected_outcome: Network adapter 1 changed from NAT to bridged on eth0

steps.instruction: Start the VM in headless mode for installation
steps.expected_outcome: VM started successfully, booting from ISO for Ubuntu installation

steps.instruction: Create initial snapshot before OS installation
steps.expected_outcome: Snapshot created successfully for rollback if needed

steps.instruction: Verify VM is running and accessible
steps.expected_outcome: Ubuntu-Server-22 showing as running with 4GB RAM, 2 CPUs, bridged network

success_criteria: Ubuntu Server VM created, configured, running from ISO, snapshot taken
cleanup: After OS installation: eject ISO, create 'Clean Install' snapshot
